text: is a Japanese short track speed skater. She competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Short track speed skaters at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Japanese female short track speed skaters Category:Olympic short track speed skaters of Japan Category:Short track speed skaters at the 2017 Asian Winter Games
title: Hitomi Saito (speed skater)
